summary: This document is a response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to the FBI's New York office, regarding a request for a search of records. It indicates that the requested records can be obtained through the Interstate Identification Index using the appropriate NCIC transaction.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: He is listed as the sender of the correspondence from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to the FBI.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The document is a response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to the FBI regarding a records search request.
It indicates that the requested records can be accessed via the Interstate Identification Index (III) using an NCIC transaction.
The correspondence is dated October 6, 2021, showing ongoing investigative activity related to the case years after Epstein's death.
